item.title: Hello world (of CI/CD)
item.description: CW21 Hack Day - 2021-03-31 to 2021-04-01 Amonette-1943 - HP1-CW21 Hack Day idea Proposer Sorrel Harriet Idea name (provisional) Hello World! (of CI/CD) Context / Research Domain Software engineering Problem Build a Hello World app (but make it support continuous deployment.) This hack day idea is more about developing skills, and less about the idea itself. I want to gain experience using best practices like TDD and CI/CD, but I never seem to get around to actually doing it.
